description: What’s your secret? Listen as anonymous callers from across the globe share what is hidden in their lives. It’s both a voyeuristic and affirming experience. Leave your own at 1-929-SECRETS (929-732-7387) or secretshotline.org.

items.title: Your Friends and Sisters

Places to help the victims of the 2023 Syrian and Turkish earthquake:

https://molhamteam.com/en/wecan
https://fundraise.givesmart.com/vf/EarthquakeSyria
https://www.globalgiving.org/projects/turkey-and-syria-earthquack-emergency-response/
More places to help:
https://linktr.ee/turkeysyriaearthquake
